reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Blackwell's lectures are engaging and well-structured. She's always willing to help outside of class.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant professor! Makes complex topics easy to understand. His enthusiasm is contagious.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Decent instructor, but the workload is overwhelming. Could improve on providing timely feedback.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Clear explanations and patient with questions. Assignments are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is passionate about chemistry and it shows. Her labs are well-organized and informative.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Lectures are dry and monotonous. Seems knowledgeable but struggles to keep the class engaged.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Dr. Patel makes it worthwhile. Her problem-solving approach is very helpful.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Insightful discussions in class, but grading can be inconsistent. Office hours are beneficial.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Thought-provoking lectures and relevant assignments. Dr. Rodriguez is an inspiration!

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Solid understanding of the subject. Uses real-world examples to illustrate concepts effectively.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Interesting course material, but Dr. Wong can be disorganized at times. Grading is fair.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Exceptional professor! Facilitates great debates and encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Field trips are a highlight. Some lectures can be a bit rushed.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Often goes off-topic and assignments are unclear. Interesting subject matter, poor execution.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Brilliant researcher and educator. Challenging course but extremely rewarding.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but can be condescending. Lectures are informative but lack engagement.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Clear and concise explanations. Assignments are creative and help reinforce concepts.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Brings real-world experience to the classroom. Group projects are particularly valuable.

reviews.subject: Geology
reviews.review: Lectures can be dry, but field work is excellent. Dr. Nelson is helpful during office hours.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Patient and skilled instructor. Makes a complex subject accessible to all skill levels.
